status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bbg1m","text":"Prepare the lysis buffer by adding  3 µL of RNase A (100 mg/mL) to 1.5 ml of Buffer G2 per sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":44,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":77,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejkfu","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1sk87","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3jtur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":2262,"mol_weight":0,"name":"RNase A","linfor":"","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/catalog/sample-technologies/dna-sample-technologies/plasmid-dna/rnase-a/","sku":"19101\t","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"2FF21CC0840211EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":25,"name":"Qiagen","link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":125646,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Buffer G2","linfor":"","url":"https://b2b.qiagen.com/us/shop/sample-technologies/dna/genomic-dna/buffer-g2","sku":"1014636","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"3B624620840211EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":25,"name":"Qiagen","link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ervks","text":"place live or flash-freezed amphipod in 2ml douncer and add 1 ml of lysis buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":68,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3j7nt","text":"gently up and down 10 times with the piston","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eo0el","text":"transfer the lysate to a 2 ml tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2is1","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7i6mv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":126102,"mol_weight":0,"name":"2 mL Eppendorf","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"C1A03380840411EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bqvq","text":"rinse the douncer with 0.5 ml lysis buffer and transfer to the 2 ml tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28h7e","text":"Incubate for 30 minutes at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"792md","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"21fm7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3F8C9210840611EC96D06F55765EDDD8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"4B90E520840611EC96D06F55765EDDD8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4i7us","text":"Add 75 µL of Proteinase K (20 mg/mL) and incubate with inversion at 50°C for 2 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djipb","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"624eq","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3212t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":119839,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Proteinase K (2 ml)","linfor":"","url":"https://www.qiagen.com/gb/shop/lab-basics/enzymes/qiagen-proteinase-k","sku":"19131","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"D89C27C0840811EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":25,"name":"Qiagen","link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"DDCDA750840811EC96D06F55765EDDD8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E857B670840811EC96D06F55765EDDD8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"50","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"donvc","text":"Wash the QIAGEN Genomic-tip with  3 x 1 mL Buffer QC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5bobl","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1kmdd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":2221,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Buffer QC","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"BDC856E0840C11EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76e7c","text":"Elute the DNA into a new 15 mL tube with 2 x 1  mL of Buffer QF prewarm to 50°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ak6kg","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5o89a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":2222,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Buffer QF","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"2A3FD370840D11EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1nqcf","text":"Add 1.4 mL of room-temperature isopropanol to the éluate, mix by inversion about 10 times, and centrifuge for 30 min at 5,500g at 4°C to pellet DNA. set centrifuge deceleration speed to level3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afb5v","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3kgjq","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f7svj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":203648,"mol_weight":0,"name":"2-propanol ","linfor":"","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/catalog/substance/2propanol60106763011?lang=en\u0026region=US","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"3971F160840E11EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":17,"name":"Sigma Aldrich","link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"5500","duration":1800,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"47E102E0840E11EC96D06F55765EDDD8","id":0,"label":"Acc 9 / Dec 3","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ef0pk","text":"Gently remove the supernatant using a P1000","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbfsj","text":"Gently resuspend the pellet with 1 ml of cold 70% ethanol using a 1000µl wide-bore tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7gpa","text":"Transfer to a new 1.5 ml tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emdhb","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"636ug","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fnc11","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":4711,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Ethanol 70% [Note: freshly prepared]","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"06427FC0840F11EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":3664,"mol_weight":0,"name":"1.5 mL Eppendorf tubes","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"10EAC540840F11EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edj1n","text":"Centrifuge for 10 min at 5,000g at 4°C to pellet DNA. set centrifuge deceleration speed to level3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7482v","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2mdjs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"5000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"240891C0840F11EC96D06F55765EDDD8","id":0,"label":"Acc 9 / Dec 3","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ajgte","text":"Remove as much supernatant as possible, avoiding touching the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i010","text":"Air dry the pellet 10 min at RT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0q42","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ik8h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"BC860EB0841311EC96D06F55765EDDD8","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C3261260841311EC96D06F55765EDDD8","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"731u0","text":"Resuspend the pellet with 50 µL of TE 1x prewarm to 50°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14pni","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d87r5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":350185,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Tris-EDTA (TE) buffer pH 8.0 1X","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"4BA61270841411EC96D06F55765EDDD8","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}}}}
